channel.title: astronomy on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in astronomy on Alok's Blog

item.title: The Astronomy Book
item.description: ### Author: DK loc 216 - “You have to have the imagination to recognize a discovery when you make one.” Clyde Tombaugh loc 225 - “What a wonderful and amazing scheme have we here of the magnificent vastness of the universe.” Christiaan Huygens loc 235 - in 1979, the first example of a gravitational lens was identified, when the image of a quasar was seen to be double due to the presence of a galaxy along the line of sight, again as relativity had predicted.
